From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Speedbreaker looked stunned for a second. "Give me a second." He then
opened a radio transmission. "Megatron, Shockwave has sent a form of
communication." he said.

------------------------------

Megatron hears the transmission, it was just as well, he could not put
up with this bickering any more. "I'll deal with the both of you later."
He began to leave. "Repair the consoul Switchblade. And don't ever call
me Meggy." he said, adding a dagger like hiss into his voice for the
last line. As he walked out he thought to himself. Shockwave would be
great to see, but he had to watch Switchblade, and he knew that. His
story was a pathetic cover up. What kind of hold did he have over the
Strikers? he thought to himself. He exited the Dark Avian, and saw both
Speedbreaker and Unitron. He looked straight into the depths of Unitron.
Without lifting his eyes, he began to speak, "You may leave us
Speedbreaker." He said, and Speedbreaker gladly turned around,
transformed, and headed back for the Maximal city.
